Everlight

Established: 1504
Revolutionary War: 1775 - 1783 (271 - 279)
War of 1812: 1812 - 1815 (308 - 311)
Running Water: 1829 (325)
Civil War: 1861 - 1865 (357 - 361)
Electricity: 1889 (385)
First Automobile: 1893 (392)
Turing machine: 1936 (432)
First Commercial Computer: 1942 (438)

[!info] Pendulum Mechanics
1d20: Even -> Heads, Odd -> Tails

buy

Phase One: Beginnings

Year: 1504
1d20: [1] = 1 -> Tails (Chaos)

The new territory is taken through war and bloodshed. The old population is wiped out, subjugated or assimilated. What valuable resource did your defeated foe have that is now yours? Name the ruler.

Year 1

Ruler: Isham Alexander Age 24

The settlement begins as a hamlet after Isham Alexander and his followers at the behest of Salvatore Einor slaughtered the indigenous people who claimed an everlasting spring of fresh water amidst the dredges of the salter marshes of the coast line.

1d20: [14] = 14 -> Even (Law)

Initial (re)building goes well and there is harmony between the residents. Name the settlement.

The rebuilding Everlight goes well and Isham and Sal maintain the peace and begin building the sanctuary for supernatural creatures Sal has envisioned.

1d20: [15] = 15 -> Odd (Chaos)

Builders begin to construct basic defenses. The project goes poorly and the structures are shabby and weak.

The initial defenses built by the humans employed by the vampires are weak and shoddy and the vampires take to digging additional means in the land itself.

1d20: [20] = 20 -> Even (Law)

Builders begin to construct basic roads. The project goes well. Upgrade population to the next stage.

As word spreads and roads are built supernaturals and humans alike come to Everlight.

Population grows and the hamlet is now a village. 9 Years have passed.

Year 10

1d20: [3] = 3 -> Odd (Chaos)

A person of importance dies suddenly, with consequences for the settlement. Who is this person and why were they important? Additionally, introduce a Secret/Mystery.

Isham Alexander dies of dysentery at the age of 34 but rumors suggest that Isham became a vampire for his service to the Sanguine Masquerade, but no one really knows what happened as there was no body to be examined.

1d20: [17] = 17 -> Odd (Choas)

There is a change in leadership through violence. Who is the new ruler?

There is some dispute about who should take over and after but one candidate is found dead in their homes. Nehemiah Edgar becomes the new governor of Everlight.

Ruler: Nehemiah Edgar Age: 32

1d20: [10] = 10 -> Even (Law)

Something useful and valuable to the settlement is discovered or invented. What is it? Upgrade population to the next stage.

While the vampires are digging into the earth they find access to the nexus powers of the Magic itself. The supernatural flock to the nexus.

Population grows and the village is now a township

1d20: [16] = 16 -> Even (Law)
1d20: [4] = 4 Years

An ally or trading partner is made out of a neighbouring settlement. Name and describe this settlement.

Year 14

Ruler: Nehemiah Edgar Age: 36

Everlight and Silenthollow begin negotiations over the nexus.

1d20: [11] = 11 -> Odd (Chaos)
1d20: [2] = 2 Years

If the last event was a rebellion, it ends in a rebel victory. The current leadership is completely replaced. If there is no war, a minor conflict is resolved at a small cost. What happened?

Year 16

Silenthollow is unsatisfied with their rights to the nexus and try to revolt, however their leadership is quickly quelled and Silenthollow is merged into Everlight without so much as a whisper.

1d20: [6] = 6 -> Even (Law)

A new natural resource is discovered that makes the settlement wealthier. What is it?

Year 36

Ruler: Nehemiah Edgar Age: 56

The Sanguine Masquerade begins production of a new drug called Nepenthe and the city grows with the abundance.

The township becomes a small town.

1d20: [12] = 12 -> Even (Law)
1d20: [6] = 6 years

There is a golden summer unlike any ever seen before. Upgrade population to the next stage.

Year 42

Ruler: Simon Rowan Age: 20

Nehemiah Edgar is relieved of his duties and Simon Rowan takes over and there is a a golden era o f growth with the nexus and nepenthe flowing.

The small town becomes a town

1d20: [7] = 7 -> Odd (Chaos)
1d20: [10] = 10 Years

Crisis in the leadership: there are no clear candidates for succession at all. How is this resolved? Who is chosen as successor?

Year 52

Ruler: Horatio Mare Age: 24

Simon Rowan overdoses on nepenthe and there is a war between candidates. In the end Sal appoints Horatio Mare as governor of Everlight.

1d20: [17] = 17 -> Odd (Chaos)
1d20: [18] = 18 Years

Builders begin to upgrade the basic defenses. Building goes poorly and the end result is weak and shabby.

Year 70

As the city expands the militia begins to grow but in an alarming anti-supernatural thanks to Venatori influence.

1d20: [3] = 3 -> Odd (Chaos)
1d20: [1] = 1 Year

Disease ravages the community. One or more people of importance die. Who are they and what is lost with their death?

Year 71

A supernatural plague is brought down upon the denizens of Everlight and Horatio Mare is among its victims. Sal appoints Edward Gillcrest as governor.

Ruler: Edward Gillcrest Age: 28

1d20: [9] = 9 -> Odd (Chaos)
1d20: [10] = 10 Years

Builders begin working on an advanced structure. What is it? The project goes poorly and the population does not change.

Year 81

The Church of the Damned begins construction but it wrought with problems from structural support issues causing collapses underground, protests by anti-supernatural influences and other things. It takes 10 years to complete.

1d20: [8] = 8 -> Even (Law)
1d20: [9] = 9 Years

A foreigner arrives at the settlement who changes everything for the better. Who are they and what change do they bring?

Year 90

Thaddeus Mantle, Alpha Therian comes the Old World seeking to form a new pack among the Everlight wolves. He is readily taken in by both the pack and the vampires as he proposes a solution to the anti-supernatural movement and rallies a fight against the Venatori.

1d20: [7] = 7 -> Odd (Chaos)
1d20: [3] = 3 Years

Someone or something useful and valuable to the settlement is lost or destroyed. Who are they or what is it? Additionally, introduce a Secret/Mystery.

Year 93

3 years after Thaddeus joins Sal and all of Everlight the Venatori are reduced to a small handful residing with in their compound. They still come to test their mettle against the supernatural community but they keep their numbers small. Rumors begin of The Ascendant Vanguard, a secret organization who are rallying together to await the return of the Ascendant.

Everlight grows as it prospers changing into more of an entertainment venue as well as a sanctuary for the supernatural. More humans come which means more money and more food for the vampires.

Town becomes a Large Town

1d20: [19] = 19 -> Odd (Chaos)

Year 137

The world begins to believe Everlight houses the Fountain of Youth among other magical artifacts and means of living forever. Little does the real world know but the only secret is that of becoming a vampire.

1d20: [14] = 14 -> Even (Law)

If you have expanded roads, start a new trading relationship. With whom is this relationship? Otherwise, nothing happens.

Relationships with Sanctuary and Haven are becoming easier to traverse and the supernatural world is growing more and more prevalent in Everlight

1d20: [13] = 13 -> Odd (Chaos)

Ruler: Rufus Williams Age: 33

The Creed of Celestial Beings wrests control of the human populace and demands a voted govenor and Rufus Williams a powerful business name and known therian becomes governor. The Sanguine Masquerade loses some of its power over Everlight.

1d20: [17] = 17 -> Odd (Chaos)

The Sanguine Masquerade with the help of the CCB and the Althalar Coven wipe out both factions leaving no traces behind that they ever existed.

1d20: [14] = 14 -> Even (Law)

A new alliance is formed. If the war was won, the settlement will be the major partner in the alliance. If not, it will be the minor partner.

The supernatural retain control of the nexus and Everlight, the humans left in control are completely regulated by the a council of Therian, Coven and Vampires. [Need a name]

Ruler: Nehemiah Hopkins Age: 24

1d20: [16] = 16 -> Even (Law)

Year 279

Sal takes Jane Cresswell, a Therian and sister to the current Pack Leader, as Chevalier, his first ever uniting the wolf pack with the vampires.

1d20: [12] = 12 -> Even (Law)
1d20: [1] = 1 Year

A mysterious event portends future prosperity. What has occurred?

Year 280

A Celestial Convergence above the Nexus conceals the city in a manner that protects the Clandestine Providence. The Convergence started with the stars aligning three nights prior, then the Aurora Borealis above the city the following night. The third night a glimmering dome of magical energy encompassed the city and protects it from human intervention. While it does not prevent humans from coming and going or living among the supernatural, it creates an unease feeling with in those who do not sense the occult naturally (or unnaturally) and most tend to leave. There was a small exodus of mundanes, but it was surpassed by the influx of other humans seeking the prosperity of Everlight once the supernatural were able to create a life more sustaining to their own.

The barrier is fortified with Sussuri magics and wards with the completion of the underground pentagram and runes built into the city's underworld securing that none of the human wars will touch Everlight.

Year 325

The council of Everlight had been welcoming of newcomers but as their seclusion elongates the more and more untrusting they become. There is even mistrust growing between the three council representatives.

The current underground infrastructure is retrofitted with indoor plumbing.

1d20: [18] = 18 -> Even (Law)

Sal's Chevalier is released. Jane Cresswell marries into the newest Alpha cementing the ties between the new Alpha, Myles Miller and the Sanguine Masquerade. Myles is also elected the new governor or Everlight by the council.

Ruler: Myles Miller Age: 22

1d20: [7] = 7 -> Odd (Chaos)
1d20: [10] = 10 Years

Guilds form. Which one has the most power? Which has the least? Additionally, introduce a Secret/Mystery.

Year 352

Each of the three guilds have a prophecy they believe will come true in the nearish future.

The Eldritch Scholars, The Veil Wardens and Nex Machina are three of the guilds that remain still today that were formed in this year. The Veil Wardens hold the most power then but it is Nex Machina that holds the most power where as they held the least at their formation.

Year 363

Grows from Small City to a City

Myles Miller has been infected with New World Order views and is pushing towards opening up Everlight to the larger human world and revealing their secrets with in. Many begin to follow.

Year 372

City Hall burns and all the current political officers perish in the fire. Much about the fire is suspect. No one knows what happened for sure, but many suspect it was the means of rooting out the New World Order. Zaccheus Richardson, a mild aged vampire created by Sal is appointed mayor. He is loyal and sired by Sal and should be readily amendable to the Clandestine Providence.

Ruler: Zaccheus Richardson Age: 145 (looks 25)

1d20: [11] = 11 -> Odd (Chaos)
1d20: [5] = 5 Years

Year 377

Against Sal's orders Richardson orders the 'gates' of Everlight closed to humans. The slaughter and containment of human residence pulls in nearly every Venatori into Everlight to shut the vampires down. They kill Zaccheus and the other vampires are subdued, but the following year the retaliate and oust the Venatori once again back to a limited number and out of their city.

A human is elected governor by the people of Everlight.

Ruler: Matthias Growden Age: 23

Christopher Wallace comes to Sal begging forgiveness as he brings news of the New World Order and their war against the Ascendant Vanguard.

Year 465

1969

A new skyscraper being erected at the heart of Everlight unearths the heart of the Nexus. A crystal so powerful that any who go near it nearly perish in their efforts. A rune of Contain Magic was placed around the heart and the building built around it. The Heart Building is the center of Everlight and from which all importance takes place.
